general.headline: Student at KU Leuven in Belgium
general.description: Hello,my name is Thao but friends call me Hanka. I am pursuing a master's degree in applied mathematics at the Charles University in Prague, Department of Mathematics and Physics. I am a huge technology enthusiast, especially when it comes to machine learning and AI. I am constantly looking for ways how to apply my mathematical knowledge in these domains. In my free time I do martial arts, travel and hang out with my friends.

jobs.description:
- implementing functionality for handling exchange of data between various web services via Python backend frameworks
- fixing bugs and writing unit tests to increase code coverage and stability of team’s project
- using Javascript frameworks to enhance the user interface of our product
- using Google’s Dialogflow framework and NLP toolkits for creating a chatbot which serves as a convenient question and answer help tool for the users of our main web application
- using Firebase and Reactjs to develop a tv dashboard

schools.description: Enjoying my study-abroad year at Belgium's top tech university. I am building on top of my mathematical foundations with courses focused on Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence.
Focused in numerically solving partial differential equations and systems of linear equations.
General mathematics with focus on numerical math and mathematical modelling.

allSkills: Python, Numerical Analysis, Math, Machine Learning, Mathematical Modeling, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), C++, Java, Microsoft Office, C, C#, Teaching, Public Speaking, Linear Algebra
